Also do you have an alternative for a reasonable price dedicated linux server?!

Greetings...

This is my first post in EgyptianGeeks group and I hope that it is not violating the rules.

Mohammed Bin Zayed International Robotics Challenge is launched .. The prizes of this competition are up to $5M dollars .. More information about the challenge rules will be sent to those who subscribe to the challenge & willing to be part of it. You can go to the website below for more info.

http://www.mbzirc.com/index.php

I'm wondering how do Egyptian colleges & universities treat robotics topic & their effect in near future
posts.caption: www.mbzirc.com
posts.description: The Mohamed Bin Zayed International Robotics Challenge (MBZIRC) is intended to be a prestigious, top end, international robotics competition, to be held every two years with total prizes of USD 5 Million.

posts.message:
Hello ya shabab :)
I'm relatively new to angular, I'm developing directive for building tree which call method back from its link function e.g. <tree retrieve-children='getAllChildren(parentId'></tree>
The questions here, 
1- can I call function outside angular? or I should register some function in $scope inside controller?
2- when to use isolated scope '&'  and when to use attributes parameter that passed to link function, then use $parse service to parse expression and invoke function?
3- I have another problem, when I try to get some data using scope '=' or even '@', I always find them undefined inside link function?!!!!!!!
Thanks in advance
